description:
A particle fluid simulation experiment created in Cinema4D using X-Particles and rendered with Redshift. Particles are advected by a fuel & smoke simulation while being affected by a separate fluid (grains) solver. The sparkles appear where the grains are more dense. The particles are also meshed to created a kind of fluid sack around the particles.

Time: 10 seconds
Size: 1280 x 1280 px
Format: MP4 without sound
